TopicTitle: [1.2.x] [1.4 in Development] Real KSC in KSP Dev Continued

Articles.Content: Well I'm going to the hospital........
I hope everything's okay! By the sounds of your post, you at least have time to notify us. Good luck, with whatever it may be.

> 
> I hope everything's okay! By the sounds of your post, you at least have time to notify us. Good luck, with whatever it may be.

So I was at a prep rally for my schools football team...... The band was way to loud or I was to close...... Busted an ear drum........ Didn't relize it until blood was dripping down my neck...... So yea
Ouch! Feel better!

Owwww... Get better soon!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-09-05T14:33:27Z" title="09/05/2015 02:33  PM" data-short="8 yr">September 5, 2015</time> by MajorLeaugeRocketScience**
Get well soon!
pretty extreme! get well soon
Any updates yet triston? How bad is it?

> 
> Any updates yet triston? How bad is it?

I might have to get surgery on it.....

> 
> I might have to get surgery on it.....

That's too bad! No worries though, the KSP community is here for you. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
This sucks... I want a new telescope bit I'm putting the 290 dollars twords my ear...... Better set up a twitch donation goal for the telescope.....
Sounds cool!! I might be watching!! Btw I followed u on twitch

I have a lockheed L-1101 fpr the rocket.

Its probably too detailed but I figure anyone can use it as a normal aircraft too. Screenshots when I can
Wait YOU have to pay for the surgery? That sounds kinda unfair if you ask me

> 
> Wait YOU have to pay for the surgery? That sounds kinda unfair if you ask me

no I just wanna help my mom out
Ah, okay. Well, that's very nice!
Triston being nice to EVEYONE!!

I had an idea. Since some people are impatient and keep asking when this will be released, why not release each pad separately when they are each complete, and only release the full pack when they are all done.
No. This will only be released when we feel like we have enough for a first release. At least my opinion.
Kart is correct.

Okay, cool. It was just an idea.

\*breaths heavily\* wish me luck. surgery today....
good luck!
Good luck Triston, we wish you well.
Why has it taken so long for me to learn of this? GIVE IT TO ME!
